title: URGENT HIRING: Medical Case Manager
salary: Php 36,000 - Php 40,000 - Starting Rate based on experience
job_overview:
We are looking for experienced Medical Case Managers to manage personal injury cases in our medical practice.

****Responsibilities:

- Be the main contact between our medical team, patients, law firms, and funding companies.
- Work with medical professionals to understand and manage personal injury cases.
- Handle requests from law firms and funding companies, including medical reports, billing, and updates.
- Monitor the progress of cases and ensure all legal and medical protocols are followed.
- Help develop care plans for personal injury patients.
- Keep accurate patient records and ensure confidentiality.


****Requirements:

- Knowledge of medical terminology, healthcare systems, and personal injury cases.
- Strong communication, organizational, and interpersonal skills.
- Ability to manage multiple tasks and pay attention to detail.
- Good problem-solving skills.


If you meet these requirements and are interested, please apply at  Upgrade to see actual info


Note: 
Please submit your application only through the provided link. 
All submissions will go directly to our HR team, and you will receive an interview invitation as soon as possible.
